00040 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 // Function: addParam()
00042 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 void MCAPIFunctionDesc::addParam(unsigned int desc, QString const& hint)
00044 {
00045     m_params.push_back(VariableDesc(desc, hint));
00046 }
00047 
00048 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 // Function: generateToolTip()
00050 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 void MCAPIFunctionDesc::generateToolTipText(unsigned int paramIndex, QString& text) const
00052 {
00053     text.clear();
00054 
00055     text += "<p style='white-space:pre'>";
00056 
00057     // First add the return value hint and the function name.
00058     text += m_returnValueDesc.hint + ' ' + m_name + '(';
00059 
00060     // Then add the function parameters.
00061     for (int i = 0; i < m_params.size(); ++i)
00062     {
00063         // Highlight the parameter of the given index.
00064         if (i == paramIndex)
00065         {
00066             text += "<b>" + m_params.at(i).hint + "</b>";
00067         }
00068         else
00069         {
00070             text += m_params.at(i).hint;
00071         }
00072 
00073         // Add comma only if this is not the last parameter.
00074         if (i < m_params.size() - 1)
00075         {
00076             text += ", ";
00077         }
00078     }
00079 
00080     text += ')';
00081 }
00082 
00083 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 // Function: getName()
00085 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 QString const& MCAPIFunctionDesc::getName() const
00087 {
00088     return m_name;
00089 }

00091 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 // Function: getParamType()
00093 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 unsigned int MCAPIFunctionDesc::getParamType(unsigned int index) const
00095 {
00096     Q_ASSERT(index < getParamCount());
00097     return m_params.at(index).type;
00098 }
00099 
00100 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00101 // Function: getParamCount()
00102 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00103 unsigned int MCAPIFunctionDesc::getParamCount() const
00104 {
00105     return m_params.count();
00106 }

00117         m_params = rhs.m_params;
00118     }
00119     
00120     return *this;
00121 }
